div.div: WAY BETTER THAN THE ACTUAL DEBATES

div.a: Best Moments From The Jon Stewart And Bill O'Reilly Debate

div.div: It will forever be known as ‘The Rumble in the Air-Conditioned Auditorium.’ TV hosts Jon Stewart and Bill O’Reilly clashed in a political debate. The Daily Beast picks the best moments.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PLGNu8&via=Digg&text=Best Moments From The Jon Stewart And Bill O'Reilly Debate

div.div: THE UNSKEWED ELECTION

div.a: In 2012, Facts Matter Less Than Ever

div.div: Barack Obama may win in November, or Mitt Romney may win, but the 2012 election already has given us its most important new word and iconic idea: Unskewing.
PHYSICS

To get the desired effect of an arrow - something pointy stuck into someone that you don't like - all you need is a pointed stick and something to launch it. So what are all those feathers doing on the back end of an arrow?
2012 ELECTION

div.a: Romney And G.O.P. Make Inroads In Silicon Valley

div.div: When President Obama makes his latest foray into Silicon Valley on Monday, he will face a technology industry more engaged than ever in the wheeling and dealing of Washington, and much more forthcoming with its political contributions — including, generously, to his rival, Mitt Romney.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WE1uxb&via=Digg&text=Romney And G.O.P. Make Inroads In Silicon Valley

div.div: BECAUSE WHY NOT?

div.a: Amazing Animations Of Fruit And Vegetable MRIs

div.div: What do you get when you take an MRI of your favorite food? These mesmerizing animated GIFs!

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QwhsGV&via=Digg&text=Amazing Animations Of Fruit And Vegetable MRIs

div.div: NOT TERRIBLY AERODYNAMIC

div.a: The Air Force's Supersonic Flying Saucer Schematics

div.div: Officially, aliens have never existed but flying saucers very nearly did. The National Archives has recently published never-before-seen schematics and details of a 1950s military venture, called Project 1794, which aimed to build a supersonic flying saucer.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TaiRXG&via=Digg&text=The Air Force's Supersonic Flying Saucer Schematics

div.div: YEA, THOSE ARE SKELETONS

div.a: Entire Cities Laid To Waste In World Of Warcraft After Possible Hack

div.div: This afternoon, Paris time, something very strange happened on various realms.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ti1nIL&via=Digg&text=Entire Cities Laid To Waste In World Of Warcraft After Possible Hack

div.div: DON'T LET YOUR DRONES WANDER

div.a: Watch The Israeli Air Force Shoot Down An Unidentified Drone

div.div: The Israeli air force shot down an unmanned drone Saturday over the northern Negev desert, the nation's military said.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WzccoN&via=Digg&text=Watch The Israeli Air Force Shoot Down An Unidentified Drone

div.div: INFOGRAPHIC
A taxonomy of the word sh*t and all that's associated with it in a handy little chart.
CRITIQUE OF HIS SUBWAY ROUTE STARTS NOW

div.a: Jay-Z Takes The Subway To His Final Brooklyn Show

div.div: Jay-Z got to his final concert at the city’s newest arena by taking one of New York’s oldest rides: the R train.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T8Cdaa&via=Digg&text=Jay-Z Takes The Subway To His Final Brooklyn Show

div.div: YOU ARE THE SPOON

div.a: Telekinesis Is Much More Real Than You Think

div.div: Physics explains why.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SVxAjU&via=Digg&text=Telekinesis Is Much More Real Than You Think

div.div: THERE'S MORE THAN JUST 'GANGNAM STYLE'

div.a: Factory Girls: The Making Of K-Pop

div.div: K-pop is an East-West mash-up. The performers are mostly Korean, and their mesmerizing synchronized dance moves, accompanied by a complex telegraphy of winks and hand gestures, have an Asian flavor, but the music sounds Western.
STUNTS

Elevated on a platform above a high-voltage Tesla coil and dressed in a 9kg (20lb) chain-mail suit, the American illusionist and endurance artist, David Blaine, performs his latest stunt named 'Electrified'.
NON-COMPETE FAIL

div.a: Sony Suing Its Spokesman For Playing Nintendo's Wii In An Ad

div.div: Following a bizarre turn of events and a highly unlikely TV commercial, actor Jerry Lambert - for years the "face" of the PlayStation brand - is being sued, along with Bridgestone, by none other than Sony itself.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UtlxRO&via=Digg&text=Sony Suing Its Spokesman For Playing Nintendo's Wii In An Ad

div.div: PSYCHOPATHS ARE SCREWED

div.a: New System Uses Empathy To Distinguish Humans From Bots

div.div: An activist group called Civil Rights Defenders has developed a new Captcha system to keep spambots out and inform users of global civil rights issues.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OKLXvU&via=Digg&text=New System Uses Empathy To Distinguish Humans From Bots
